skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

Has a 50% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns on 2 random enemies if this Champion has full HP.
skills.name: Soulsuck Tendrils
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of stealing all buffs from the target.

Also has a 60% chance of stealing 50% of the target's max Turn Meter.
skills.name: Fateful Trickster

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. The first hit on each target also has a 75% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%.

The second hit on each target also has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns if this Champion has full HP.
skills.name: Wild Surge
skills.books:

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Whenever 4 or more buffs are placed on the enemy team in a single turn, places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP for 2 turns.
skills.name: Enchanter [P]
